title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 587.6 - Penalty
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 587.6 - Penalty

State Regulations
(a) Each violation
of the parking regulations that is cited with a parking citation will carry a
fine as follows: (1)

Parking in a handicapped
parking place without possessing a handicapped parking tag, or parking in any
fire lane: $50. (2)

Any other
violation of Section
587.4
of this Part: $35. (b) All fines for parking
penalties collected will be deposited in the State University income fund as
required by 8 NYCRR
560.3. (c) Failure to pay fines for parking penalties, or repeated parking violations, may
result in administrative action up to and including fines and the loss of
parking privileges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
587.6

Adopted

New

York State Register July 15, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 28, eff. 7/15/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
